data.comment: Raul Silva (Braga) is shown a red card without being on the pitch!
The match is underway in Porto.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 2, Braga to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Porto.
In the minute 3, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jesus Corona for Porto is whistled offside.
Porto drives forward and Otavio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 6, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Free kick Porto.
Pepe (Porto) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Moussa Marega gets his shot on target but fails to score for Porto.
Moussa Marega for Porto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Braga throw-in in Porto's half.
Braga are coming forward and Ricardo Horta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Bruno Viana (Braga) gets a yellow card.
Porto drive forward but Jesus Corona is judged offside.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
In the minute 16, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Porto's Moussa Marega has run offside.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Andre Castro scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio do Dragao.
Nuno Sequeira with an assist there.
In the minute 23, In Porto Braga's Abel Ruiz is caught offside.
Throw-in Braga.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 25, Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
In the minute 27, Porto's Otavio breaks free at Estadio do Dragao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Braga have a goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro awards Braga a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Joao Pinheiro signals a Porto throw-in in Braga's half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Porto.
Porto to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
In the minute 34, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Braga's Nuno Sequeira gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Dragao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 37, Porto's Jesus Corona misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Braga at Estadio do Dragao.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 38, Joao Pinheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Throw-in Braga.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Porto.
In the minute 42, Joao Pinheiro awards Porto a goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto.
Otavio of Porto is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Joao Pinheiro signals a throw-in for Porto, close to Braga's area.
Joao Pinheiro will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Braga's half?
In the minute 45, Porto have been given a penalty at Estadio do Dragao...
Joao Pinheiro blows to end the first-half.
Goal! Porto draw level to 1-1 through a Sergio Oliveira header.
In the minute 45, Jesus Corona instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Alex Telles gives Porto a 2-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 46, Joao Pinheiro has blown to start the second-half.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 48, Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Porto.
Ricardo Horta of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 49, Porto have a goal kick.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Joao Pinheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In the minute 55, Nuno Sequeira of Braga is pulled up for offside.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto.
Porto to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Porto.
Pepe (Porto) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Braga at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 57, Joao Pinheiro awards Braga a goal kick.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Ricardo Esgaio (Braga) has received a yellow card from Joao Pinheiro.
Carlos Carvalhal (Braga) is making a first substitution, with Wenderson Galeno replacing Abel Ruiz.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Porto throw-in in Braga's half.
In the minute 61, Andre Horta is replacing Andre Castro for the away team.
The away team have replaced Raul Silva with Guilherme Schettine. This is the third substitution made today by Carlos Carvalhal.
In the minute 62, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Porto.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
Fransergio's header is off-target for Braga.
In the minute 67, Porto have a goal kick.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Porto.
Porto's Sergio Oliveira has been booked in Porto.
In the minute 69, In Porto Braga attack through Ricardo Horta. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Braga.
In the minute 71, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Zaidu Sanusi is on a sub for Sergio Oliveira for Porto.
Free kick Porto.
In the minute 72, At Estadio do Dragao, Andre Horta has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 75, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto.
Joao Pinheiro blows against Braga's Guilherme Schettine for offside.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
David Carmo for Braga has been booked by Joao Pinheiro and receives a first yellow card.
Vitor Tormena is replacing Nuno Sequeira for Braga at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 78, Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Dragao with Iuri Medeiros replacing Al Musrati.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jesus Corona is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 80, Porto's Jesus Corona looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Porto.
Free kick Braga.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
In the minute 83, Porto's Pepe attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Braga have a goal kick.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Porto.
Sergio Conceicao is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Dragao with Mamadou Loum replacing Mateus Uribe.
Sergio Conceicao (Porto) has taken off Jesus Corona who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Mehdi Taremi is the replacement.
An attacking Porto player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Alex Telles extends Porto's lead from the spot. They now lead 3-1.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braga's Andre Horta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Joao Pinheiro awards Porto a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 3-1.
The home team replace Otavio with Fabio Vieira.
